item.title: Broken Pavement Slabs in Hydefield Close N21 2PS, 24th July
item.description:
The pavement slabs are broken between 28 and 29 Hydefield Close N21 2PS - long stretch, going around a corner. The pavemen slabs are also broken, opposite the houses from 25 to 27 Hydefield Close N21 2PS - on the grass bank side of the road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hydefield Close, Edmonton, London

item.title: Fly-tipping at Wilderton Road, 24th July
item.description:
Fly-tipping of garden waste and other household items on Wilderton Road. They have been here for several weeks, this has been reported to the council already however no action is being taken. Please remove
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Wilderton Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Car horns/beeping/road rage, 24th July
item.description:
There is incessant beeping from traffic on Mare St, particularly near the junction of Morning Ln at all hours. Not a minute goes by where someone isn’t beeping their horn, sometimes at 5/6am and up until 1/2am. It has got worse since the construction began
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Mare Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping, 24th July
item.description:
On RBG owned grass & bushes open space, on Donaldson Rd where it joins Shooters Hill, opposite Hill End. RBG workers yesterday cut back the bushes here (all very good) & now I can see some flytipping that had been hidden by those bushes. There are bits of rubbish in the bushes all along this space, the main rubbish I saw were a few old bricks and the remains on a metal ironing board.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Donaldson Road, Shooters Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Urgent: Unauthorised Pavement Works, 24th July
item.description:
I am writing to report that unauthorised people are carrying out pavement works, including breaking and lifting slabs, without obtaining prior permission. The area is currently under a potentially hazardous condition and requires immediate investigation.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Ashwin Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Kingswood junction Chevening traffic islands, 24th July
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Chevening Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet
